name: Runevale
description:
Auberon needs your help! The potion master of the Runevale potion shop has been called away on urgent business. As his apprentice, you are tasked with running the shop on your own. But there is a problem; you have lost your memory.

Master the magical potions in your recipe book and craft them on demand for the residents of Runevale. Unlock new potions as you play through story mode. Keep your customers happy and earn tips you can spend on special items. Can you stand up to the challenge and discover the secrets of the Runevale potion shop? Auberon is counting on you!

Features:

•Fast paced and simple gameplay

•12 Story mode levels

•Arcade mode

•4 Power ups

•In game shop

•Earn tips to spend in the shop

•Top your high scores and get all of the stars for each level
